quotes.quote: Practice rather than preach. Make of your life an affirmation, defined by your ideals, not the negation of others. Dare to the level of your capability then go beyond to a higher level.
The practice of leadership is not the same as the exercise of power.
Only through practice and more practice, until you can do something without conscious effort.
Through practice, gently and gradually we can collect ourselves and learn how to be more fully with what we do.
Everything we do is practice for something greater than where we currently are.
We learn by practice. Whether it means to learn to dance by practicing dancing or to learn to live by practicing living, the principles are the same. One becomes in some area an athlete of God.
You can practice to attain knowledge, but you can't practice to attain wisdom.
Practice only makes for improvement.
Practice puts brains in your muscles.
Only by practice and non-attachment can we conquer mind.
Practice makes better and prayer makes perfect. The more we do, the easier it gets, and all the while praying perfects us in the art.
We need to learn how to honor and use a practice for as long as it serves us.
Practice the art of patience for nature never acts in haste.
The practice of forgiveness is our most important contribution to the healing of the world.
Preaching is to much avail, but practice is far more effective. A godly life is the strongest argument you can offer the skeptic.
What you practice, is what you'll do.
Practice is everything. This is often misquoted as Practice makes perfect.
Take chances, make mistakes. That's how you grow. Pain nourishes your courage. You have to fail in order to practice being brave.
To practice the process of conflict resolution, we must completely abandon the goal of getting people to do what we want.
Practice means to perform, over and over again in the face of all obstacles, some act of vision, of faith, of desire. Practice is a means of inviting the perfection desired.
The more you practice the better you'll be, the harder you train the great in you they'll see.
Good ideas are not adopted automatically. They must be driven into practice with courageous patience.
When you practice gratefulness, there is a sense of respect toward others.
Practice like it's a game; play the game like it's practice.
Practice has a logic which is not that of the logician.
We must patiently practice every day.
They say that nobody is perfect. Then they tell you practice makes perfect. I wish they'd make up their minds.
We are practicing what we preach so that we may preach what we practice.
Practice without improvement is meaningless.
